title: About Us
description: Learn about Horizon Community Foundation's mission, history, and the team behind our community programs.

blocks.title: About Horizon Community Foundation
blocks.subtitle: Building stronger communities through education and empowerment since 2009

blocks.heading: Our Mission
blocks.content:
Horizon Community Foundation is dedicated to empowering individuals and strengthening communities through education, mentorship, and engagement programs.

We believe that every person has the potential to thrive when given the right opportunities and support. Our programs are designed to break down barriers and create pathways to success for people of all ages and backgrounds.

items.title: Foundation Established
items.description: Horizon Community Foundation was founded by a group of dedicated community leaders who saw the need for accessible education and support programs.

items.title: Youth Leadership Program Launched
items.description: Our flagship youth program began, providing mentorship and leadership training to local high school students.

items.title: Community Center Opens
items.description: We opened our first dedicated community center, providing a hub for all our programs and events.

items.title: Digital Transformation
items.description: Launched virtual programs and digital skills training to serve our community during challenging times.

items.title: Expanding Our Reach
items.description: Now serving over 2,500 community members annually with plans to expand to neighboring communities.

blocks.heading: Our Values
blocks.content:
Community First: Every decision we make centers on the wellbeing of our community members.

Accessibility: We believe everyone deserves access to quality education and support, regardless of their background.

Empowerment: We don't just provide services â€“ we equip people with skills and confidence to succeed independently.

Collaboration: We work alongside community partners, businesses, and volunteers to maximize our impact.

blocks.text: Whether you volunteer, donate, or spread the word, you can help us build stronger communities.
